headline: Zebra Technologies Unveils Solutions Advancing Intelligent Automation at ProMat 2025
summary: CHICAGO, March 17, 2025--Zebra Technologies Corporation, a global leader in digitizing and automating frontline workflows, today announced new solutions to advance automation and visibility across manufacturing, warehousing, and supply chain operations. Zebra’s portfolio of new and current solutions is showcased in Booth #S637 at ProMat 2025 on March 17-20 at Chicago’s McCormick Place.

content.title: Zebra Technologies Unveils Solutions Advancing Intelligent Automation at ProMat 2025
content.summary: CHICAGO, March 17, 2025--Zebra Technologies Corporation, a global leader in digitizing and automating frontline workflows, today announced new solutions to advance automation and visibility across manufacturing, warehousing, and supply chain operations. Zebra’s portfolio of new and current solutions is showcased in Booth #S637 at ProMat 2025 on March 17-20 at Chicago’s McCormick Place.

thumbnail.caption: Zebra Technologies unveils Aurora Velocity™ scan tunnel that ensures efficient, error-free package sorting and routing to drive automated warehouse operations.
